document.masterDocTitle: Pelagic amphipods (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Hyperiidea) in western Mexico. 6. Superfamily Vibilioidea. Families Paraphronimidae and Vibiliidae

Remarks . Recorded from a wide depth range, from the surface to 1756 m ( Shih & Hendrycks 2003 ) and to 2860 m depth (García Madrigal 2007). Shih & Hendrycks (2003) reported this species as the predominant species of
Vibilia
in their eastern Pacific survey. Lavaniegos (2014 , 2020 ) reported it as one of the most abundant off the Baja California Peninsula.
